FuncDef: The display bgp mvpn brief command displays brief information about multicast VPN instances. The display bgp mvpn brief command displays brief information about multicast VPN instances.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an MVPN instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces. The VPN instance name cannot be _public_. If the character string is quoted by double quotation marks, the character string can contain spaces.

Displays information about all MVPN instances.
-
